org.apache.streams.sysomos.provider

Interface RequestBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRequestBuilder, ContentRequestBuilder

    public interface RequestBuilder
    Simplifying abstraction that aids in building a request to the Sysomos API in a chained fashion.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BeatApi.BeatResponse execute()
      Executes the request to the Sysomos Heartbeat API and returns a valid response
      URL getRequestUrl()
      Returns the full url need to execute a request.
      RequestBuilder setAddedAfterDate(org.joda.time.DateTime afterDate)
      Sets the date after which documents should be returned from Sysomos.
      RequestBuilder setAddedBeforeDate(org.joda.time.DateTime beforeDate)
      Sets the date before which documents should be returned from Sysomos.
      RequestBuilder setHeartBeatId(int hid)
      Sets the Sysomos Heartbeat ID.
      RequestBuilder setHeartBeatId(String hid)
      Sets the Sysomos Heartbeat ID as a String.
      RequestBuilder setOffset(long offset)
      Sets the starting offset for the number of documents given the other parameters.
      RequestBuilder setReturnSetSize(long size)
      Sets the size of the expected response.

    • Method Detail

      • setAddedAfterDate

        RequestBuilder setAddedAfterDate(org.joda.time.DateTime afterDate)
        Sets the date after which documents should be returned from Sysomos.
        Parameters:
        afterDate - the DateTime instance representing the after date
        Returns:
        The RequestBuilder for continued Chaining

      • setAddedBeforeDate

        RequestBuilder setAddedBeforeDate(org.joda.time.DateTime beforeDate)
        Sets the date before which documents should be returned from Sysomos.
        Parameters:
        beforeDate - the DateTime instance representing the before date
        Returns:
        The RequestBuilder for continued Chaining

      • setReturnSetSize

        RequestBuilder setReturnSetSize(long size)
        Sets the size of the expected response.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of documents
        Returns:
        The RequestBuilder for continued Chaining

      • setOffset

        RequestBuilder setOffset(long offset)
        Sets the starting offset for the number of documents given the other parameters.
        Parameters:
        offset - the starting offset
        Returns:
        The RequestBuilder for continued Chaining

      • setHeartBeatId

        RequestBuilder setHeartBeatId(int hid)
        Sets the Sysomos Heartbeat ID.
        Parameters:
        hid - Heartbeat ID
        Returns:
        The RequestBuilder for continued Chaining

      • setHeartBeatId

        RequestBuilder setHeartBeatId(String hid)
        Sets the Sysomos Heartbeat ID as a String.
        Parameters:
        hid - Heartbeat ID string
        Returns:
        The RequestBuilder for continued Chaining

      • getRequestUrl

        URL getRequestUrl()
        Returns the full url need to execute a request.

        Example: http://api.sysomos.com/dev/v1/heartbeat/content?apiKey=YOUR -APIKEY&hid=YOUR-HEARTBEAT-ID&offset=0&size=10& addedAfter=2010-10-15T13:00:00Z&addedBefore=2010-10-18T13:00:00Z

        Returns:
        the URL to use when making requests of Sysomos Heartbeat

      • execute

        BeatApi.BeatResponse execute()
        Executes the request to the Sysomos Heartbeat API and returns a valid response
